comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: According to Wiki, the keel of this ship was laid on Sept. 11, 1911; depending on the speed of shipbuilding back then, I'd guess this picture to be taken in early 1912.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The battleship New York was launched in 1912, commissioned in 1914, and decommissioned in 1946. After service in both World Wars, she was sunk as a target off Oahu on July 8, 1948. MaritimeQuest has seven pages of photos of the New York, starting here. This photo is among them. There's also a link there to a page of builder's data.
